experience.title: Deep Learning Intern
experience.description: Objective: -To implement the deep learning model designed in the lab on REDEFINE by successful conversion of the operators.â€¢Analyzed and studied the Deep Learning Model developed, which is capable of Object Detection and Tracking using LSTM and CNN.â€¢Ported the model successfully from PyTorch to ONNX and verified the conversion of all the operators using Netron and ONNX checker.â€¢Programmed custom C implementation of the operators in the ONNX nodes and tested with Tensorflow and PyTorch implementations.
